SongName: Leaning On the Everlasting Arms (True Grit Version)
Album: True Grit (Soundtrack from the Motion Picture)
Lyric:
[by:切尔西的匕首]
[ti:]
[ar:]
[al:]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:03.42]What a fellowship, what a joy divine,
[00:09.27]Leaning on the everlasting arms;
[00:15.07]What a blessedness, what a peace is mine,
[00:21.18]Leaning on the everlasting arms.
[00:28.98]Leaning, leaning,
[00:35.04]Safe and secure from all alarms;
[00:40.79]Leaning, leaning,
[00:46.97]Leaning on the everlasting arms.
[00:55.10]Oh, how sweet to walk in this pilgrim way,
[01:00.90]Leaning on the everlasting arms;
[01:06.95]Oh, how bright the path grows from day to day,
[01:13.42]Leaning on the everlasting arms.
[01:21.52]Leaning, leaning,
[01:27.48]Safe and secure from all alarms;
[01:33.73]Leaning, leaning,
[01:40.33]I Leaning on the everlasting arms.
